content.prompt: Planet X is a spherical planet of uniform density. Which of the following describes the gravitational field inside Planet X?

choices.label: It is zero everywhere inside the planet.
It is a nonzero constant everywhere inside the planet.
It decreases with increasing distance from the planet’s center.
It increases with increasing distance from the planet’s center.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
